page.title: 19WILBERFOSS PEOPLE LEAVING
page.content: In Wilberfoss many people come to live only for a short time,sometimes for five years or less.There are many reasons for moving.Often it is because jobs are being changed,or because a larger house is needed owing to a larger family.People moving said that they were looking forward to going,but would miss the friends they had made.Some people are not moving out of the area altogether,but want to be closer to work,often in York. {TYPES OF HOUSING IN THE VILLAGE. The Different types of Housing to be found in the village are as follows {Bungalows detached 14.4% Bungalows {semi 19.6% Houses detached 35.9% {Houses semi 22.6% older cottages 3.7% {Terraced houses 1.6% council houses {1.8% This year 2 Airey Houses have {been demolished Those were built as {temporary Housing after the war. }
